metadata.directionblocks_have_no_metadata=The features of the Information tab for a Direction Block are not active since these "Currikulum Builder Directions" do not require Information. Direction Blocks are not searchable in the Curriki repository.
metadata.add_resource_metadata_desc=
  • You must provide basic information to describe it.
  • The information you provide makes the resource or collection easier to find.

metadata.complete_required_fields=(!) Complete the required fields below.
metadata.review_and_update_fields=Review and update the six fields below as needed.
metadata.required_information=Required Information
metadata.more_info_false=Open More Information
metadata.more_info_true=Close More Information
metadata.more_info_text=Curriki automatically supplies additional information about your resource or collection, such as license type and access privileges.  By clicking Next, you agree to apply a Curriki-compatible license to your resource or collection.

If you want to adjust the license or any other information for your resource or collection, click More Information.

metadata.title_title=Title
metadata.title_txt=If you copied this resource, update the Title to indicate how it is different from the original.
metadata.title_content=Enter your title here.
metadata.title_tooltip=Name for this element, including display in search lists and as a caption for images
metadata.copy_info_text=If you have copied this resource, update the Title and Description fields to indicate how it is different from the original.
metadata.description_title=Description
metadata.description_txt=If you copied this resource, update the Description to indicate how it is different from the original.
metadata.description_content=
metadata.description_tooltip=When people read this description they should know what your resource is. The more detail the better!
metadata.keywords_title=Key Words
metadata.keywords_txt=

metadata.educational_level_txt=Select one or more level(s).
metadata.educational_level_content=

metadata.educational_level2_txt=Select one or more level(s).

metadata.instructional_component2_title=Instructional Component Type
metadata.instructional_component2_txt=Scroll to find the best option. You can select multiple options
by hitting the Ctrl (PC) or Apple (Mac) key as you click to select.
metadata.instructional_component2_content=
metadata.instructional_component2_tooltip=Type or format of content that best matches your resource
metadata.right_section=Rights License and Ownership Information
metadata.right_holder_title=Rights Holder(s)
metadata.right_holder_txt=
metadata.right_holder_content=
metadata.right_holder_tooltip=Copyright holder(s) names for this asset
metadata.rights_title=Access Privileges
metadata.rights_txt=Select Private to keep your material in "draft" until it is ready to be released
into the repository for general use.
metadata.rights_tooltip=This setting determines who has the rights to view or edit any resource.
metadata.rights_content=
metadata.rightsHolder_tooltip=This is the person or organization that holds the rights to this resource -- the owner of this intellectual property.
metadata.license_type_title=License Deed
metadata.license_type_txt=Please be sure you have read and understand the Terms of Use and that you have the rights to contribute this content.

The Curriki-compatible license provides maximum flexibility to the community, so members can use and modify others' contributions.  The default Curriki license is a widely used Creative Commons license Attribution 3.0.  If you wish to assign another license, please select from the drop-down list below.  To learn about all the Creative Commons licenses, please click here.

Set License Deed:
metadata.license_type_content=
metadata.licenseType2_tooltip=License protecting this content
metadata.field_missing=The following field is mandatory.
metadata.fields_missing=All fields in this step are required. Please complete the field(s)
metadata.when_you_add_a_resource=When you add a resource or create a new resource or collection...
metadata.hidden_from_search=Hidden from Search
metadata.hidden_from_search_title=Hide from Search
metadata.hidden_from_search_txt=Some content is not suitable for display in search results, because it does not offer
value to the community as a standalone element.

If this is such an element (for instance, a table) that only makes sense within the context of a
larger resource (like a lesson plan), please click below so this element will not appear in
search results.
metadata.hidden_from_search_tooltip=Hides this element from search.
metadata.hidden_from_search_after=Do not show this element in search results.
metadata.save_button_text=Once you click Save, the system will process any changes while you see the "Loading" message.

Click a tab such as Edit to move into another mode for this resource, or click Close at the top of the screen to end this session in the Currikulum Builder.

edit.propose_duplication_title=Edit or Copy?
edit.propose_duplication_text=Are you sure you want to change this resource created by {0}?

To edit this resource for your own specific purpose, create a new version by clicking Copy below to save it as your own. (Next you will be prompted to save it into your My Curriki under a different title.)

If you want to edit this resource for use by the whole Curriki community, click Continue to Edit. Your modifications will change the document of record and the previous version will be available under the Currikulum Builder's History tab.

curriki.crs.generatedcomment=This resource was reviewed using the rubric for {0} and received an overall CRS rating of {1}

 Its component ratings were:

  • Technical Completeness: {2}
  • Content Accuracy: {3}
  • Appropriate Pedagogy: {4}


    • {5}
curriki.crs.generatedcommentunrated=This resource was reviewed using the rubric for {0} and could not receive a rating.

     Its component ratings were:

  • Technical Completeness: {1}
  • Content Accuracy: {2}
  • Appropriate Pedagogy: {3}


    • {4}
